Title: Anand
Writer: Hrishikesh Mukherjee (story), Hrishikesh Mukherjee (screenplay), Gulzar (screenplay), D.N. Mukherjee (screenplay), Bimal Dutta (screenplay), Gulzar (dialogue)
Actors: Rajesh Khanna, Amitabh Bachchan, Sumita Sanyal, Ramesh Deo
Plot: The story of a terminally ill man who wishes to live life to the fullest before the inevitable occurs, as told by his best friend.
